ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: that it is He Who is the Lord of Sirius;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That He is the Lord of Sirius;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that He is the Lord of Sirius,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who is the Lord of Sirius.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And that He only is the Lord of the star Sirius?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that He is the Lord of Ash-Shi`ra.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that He is the Lord of the Sirius;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And that He it is Who is the Lord of Sirius;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that He is the Lord of Sirius.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And that it is He Who is the Lord of Sirius.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That He is the Lord of Sirius (the Mighty Star);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that He (Allah) is the Lord of Sirius (the star which the pagan Arabs used to worship);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and that He is the Lord of (the star) Sirius,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:49] and that it is He Who is the Lord of Sirius — this is a star [lying] beyond [the constellation of] Gemini, which was worshipped in the time of pagandom (jāhiliyya);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And that He it is Who is the Lord of Sirius) which was worshipped by Khuza'ah;
